summary: Before being sent to serve in Vietnam, two brothers and their girlfriends take one last road trip, but when they get into an accident, a terrifying experience will take them to a secluded house of horrors, with a chainsaw-wielding killer.
cast: Jordana Brewster|Taylor Handley|Diora Baird|Matt Bomer|R. Lee Ermey|Andrew Bryniarski|Lee Tergesen|Terrence Evans|Kathy Lamkin|Marietta Marich|L.A. Calkins|Tim DeZarn|Allison Marich|Marcus H. Nelson|Lew Temple|Cyia Batten|Melody Chase|Heather Kafka|Emily Kaye|John Larroquette
keywords: tied feet|tied up while barefoot|cleavage|scantily clad female|panties
title: La matanza de Texas: El origen
